numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are five sports.
2. For all five sports, the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of coaches of color.
3. Male basketball has 83 percent players of color.
4. Female basketball has 83 percent players of color.
5. The percentage of coaches of color in basketball is fairly low.
6. Major League Soccer has 41 percent coaches of color.
7. If Major League Soccer has 41 percent coaches of color then Major League Soccer has 59 percent white coaches.
8. I wonder if these percentages were significantly different five years ago.
9. I wonder if these percentages were significantly different ten years ago.
10. I wonder if these percentages will be significantly different in five years.
11. I wonder if these percentages will be significantly different in ten years.
12. The National Football League has a high percentage of players of color.
13. The National Football League has a low percentage of coaches of color.
14. I wonder why the National Football League has a low percentage of coaches of color.
15. This situation impacts my community.
16. This situation impacts me.
17. Portsmouth lacks diversity.
18. In Portsmouth, we do not necessarily see as much racism as racism exists around the country.
19. The graphs show evidence.
20. The graphs show that there are not many professional sport coaches of color.
21. The graphs show that there are many players of color.
22. This evidence suggests that some aspect of racism exists.
23. Changes regarding this situation are necessary.
24. The headline is: The Lack of Diversity in Professional Sports.
